author: Francisco-Gamino
body:
- [x] Resolves issue ##1325 - Implement Invoke-Item/Get-Help -Online for .NET Core on Desktop.
- [x] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Build failures need to be fixed

comments.author: Francisco-Gamino
comments.body: Closing PR. I will submit a new one once I get back from vacation next week. Thanks.

title: Enabling invoke-item and get-help <cmdletName> -online for CoreCLR on Desktop
